turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Emily Carter. It's been impossible to get through on the phone. This is so frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can help with that. Could you please provide your full name and date of birth for verification purposes?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's Michael Davis, and my date of birth is 03/15/1988. What's Dr. Carter's availability looking like in the next few weeks? I prefer mornings if possible.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, Michael. Let me check Dr. Carter's availability. I see an opening on October 26th at 9:00 AM and another on November 2nd at 10:30 AM. Would either of those times work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: October 26th at 9:00 AM works perfectly. Now, can you tell me if this appointment is considered a specialist visit under my insurance plan? I'm trying to figure out what my co-pay will be this time.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, October 26th at 9:00 AM it is. Regarding your co-pay, I do not have direct access to your insurance policy details to provide that specific information. However, I recommend contacting your insurance provider directly or checking their website for your specialist co-pay amount. You can also ask our billing department at [phone number] if they have more information related to Dr. Carter's classification under your plan after the appointment is scheduled. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
